analysis.description:
Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/26/0x2213f8ec5957d7c81c588f31223f2149b13b5e54.sol#715-717) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/26/0x2213f8ec5957d7c81c588f31223f2149b13b5e54.sol#717)

TimedCrowdsale.TimedCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/26/0x2213f8ec5957d7c81c588f31223f2149b13b5e54.sol#785-796) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/26/0x2213f8ec5957d7c81c588f31223f2149b13b5e54.sol#788-793)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/26/0x2213f8ec5957d7c81c588f31223f2149b13b5e54.sol#801-808) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/26/0x2213f8ec5957d7c81c588f31223f2149b13b5e54.sol#808)
